title: 'Convenient
column5: 'Good sturdy bucket. Does its job. Colour looks exactly like shown in picture. The handle is also quite sturdy & convenient to hold. I did not want to go to the market for buying 1 single bucket
column6: so ordered online. It was worth buying.For the price offered and the size is good to go for.'

title: 'Good product'
body: 'I found these buckets very strong and very helpful The price is fully justified As these are the best quality bucket They are strong durable'

title: 'Super sturdy & good quality'
body: The bucket is made out of toughened plastic and is very sturdy and doesn't slip as well. The quality and finishing of the plastic is just excellent. Kuber does very durable buckets and the handles are also good Value for money product and highly useful

title: 'Nice buckets'
body: 'Good Quality bucket set. Sufficient storage capacity as a bathroom bucket. Overall good deal.'

title: 'Good color'
body: 'The bucket color is good and is of compact size. Takes less space.'

title: 'Good quality plastic'
body: 'The bucket is very sturdy and durable
column5: also size is medium and handle is also strong. Good buy at this price.'

title: 'Good quality'
body: 'Good quality durable plastic bucket really like it and its colour is also looking different I really like it'

title: 'Quality is very low'
body: 'Quality is not good and size is small as shown'

title: 'Multipurpose bucket'
body: 'The plastic quality seems adequate. The flexibility is a good aspect as rigid one breaks easily. The value for money.'

title: 'Same as shown in the picture'
body: 'The product is same as shown in the picture and is durable.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'This is a nice bucket at this valuable rate. The quality of plastic is very good and the size is also nice for bathing purpose.'

title: 'Nice plastic bucket'
body: 'The plastic of the bucket has sufficient strength. The size and diameter is adequate. Can be used in multipurpose way.'

title: 'Excellent'
body: 'Good and sturdy buckets. Approx 15 lit capacity'

title: Black buckets were sent. No comments.... please don't buy from this KUBER industries

body: 'The bucket is not translucent as shown in the picture. there is no measuring scale on it either.'
